greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse of a double factorial related triangle.
comment: Inverse of A112292. Similar results can be obtained for higher factorials.
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 0..50 of the triangle, flattened
formula: T(n, k) = 1 - 2*n if k = n-1 otherwise 0, with T(n, n) = 1.
program: def A112295(n,k): return 1 if k==n else 1-2*n if k==n-1 else 0
flatten([[A112295(n,k) for k in (0..n)] for n in (0..15)]) # _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 17 2021
A112295:= func< n,k | k eq n select 1 else k eq n-1 select 1-2*n else 0 >;
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Sep 01 2005
